title: I just played Fiora for my first time, the new Fiora
body:
Anyone else think she is too easy to play now? There are only 2 things about her that make her hard to play, 1 is her inability to stay alive in a team fight unless you build right, and 2 is hitting her vitals for her ult.

I have seen bad Fiora's do good late game once they get some items and now I know why.

Was the old Fiora always this strong? Or am I missing something?

replies.body: im so glad they changed her compared to the old fiora where it was if the whole team was closing on you and they had less than 80% health ult to become untargetable and free penta
I prefer the new Fiora over the old "slam your head on the keyboard and get a free penta" playstyle of the old Fiora, but she is pretty strong atm.

I've only played the new Fiora, and I've gotta say it's pretty damn overpowered. Her ult literally makes her invulnerable given that no burst damage is around and she can continue attacking. If you build her right she's virtually unkillable. I do agree that her vitals are confusing and hard to hit, which is a downfall. It is a drastic change from the old Fiora though, her ult was entirely changed.
